column1: '''''Tolkien's Great War''''' is a [[2014]] documentary film about the experiences of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his closest friends in the First World War. Made by two former pupils of King Edward's School, Zander and Elliot Weaver, the film-makers interview [[John Garth]], Simon Stacey and Paul Golightly.
*[http://www.kes.org.uk/tolkien-great-war.html Tolkien's Great War documentary] at King Edward School website
